trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.AfterInsert" /> and <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.BeforeDelete" /> events of an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> control, and for the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.AfterInsert" /> and <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.BeforeDelete" /> events of an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> 控件的 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.AfterInsert" /> 和 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.BeforeDelete" /> 事件的数据，以及 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> 控件的 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.AfterInsert" /> 和 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.BeforeDelete" /> 事件的数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.AfterInsert> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.BeforeDelete> events.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.AfterInsert>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.BeforeDelete>事件。

trans-unit.source: These event handlers display a message box before an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> is deleted from the document, and after an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> is added to the document.
trans-unit.target: 这些事件处理程序显示消息框，然后<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>文档，而后删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>添加到文档。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.RemoveChild%2A> method to delete a node and programmatically raise the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.BeforeDelete> event.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.RemoveChild%2A>方法来删除节点，并以编程方式引发<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.BeforeDelete>事件。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> named `CustomerNode` that contains a child node named `CustomerDateNode`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>名为`CustomerNode`，其中包含一个名为的子节点`CustomerDateNode`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether an action was a result of an undo or redo command.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示某操作是否为撤消或恢复命令的结果。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the action was a result of an undo or redo command; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果操作的结果的撤消或重做命令中;否则为<see langword="false" />。
